page.title: 06Changing Life in the Village
page.content: In the village men mostly worked on farms or railways. The women mostly worked in houses tidying them up if they were married.On the village green a{jubilee tree}was planted in 1897.It was planted for the{Queens Diamond {Jubilee.}In the village there were {four}shops.What we now call the pleasure ground used to be called the recreation ground.They had a{cobbler, {a blacksmith, a bricklayer, a wheel {wright, a grocer, a vet,a mole catcher {and a tailor.}Now we have only got two shops in the village.Most of the married women don't work but quite a few work on the farm.In the village we have only{two blacksmiths.
